data.eml:eml: A rare genus Odontopsen Tsuneki in China (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Crabronidae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Li, Li, Qiang, Chen, Xue-Xin (2010): A rare genus Odontopsen Tsuneki in China (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Crabronidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2359: 58-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193611
